short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly see peoples Ethereum balance on Twitter. Based on ENS domains and owner of NFT pfp.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curious how much ETH a Twitter user has in his wallet? ü§î

Look no further! üíé

This FREE extension will tell you right away! By automatically detecting ENS domains in usernames and detecting owners of NFT pfps, it will query the Ethereum blockhain to find out there wallet balance!

This extension works hand in hand with the NFT "Inspect" Chrome extension ü§ù
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/inspect/kamfleanhcmjelnhaeljonilnmjpkcjc
Install it to allow TwittEreum discover even more Twitter accounts Ethereum balances!
